title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 196.22 - Policy concerning course cancellation and tuition refund
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 196.22 - Policy concerning course cancellation and tuition refund

State Regulations
A sponsor which requests approval of courses from the
department must provide its policy relating to course cancellation and tuition
refunds to its students prior to the acceptance of any fees from that
student. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
196.22

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
